show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: USA: The Most Dangerous Country Of All Time

title: USA: The Most Dangerous Country Of All Time
content:
list of all the ridiculous places in the world that Washington seems to think it needs to ‘protect’, welcome or... <!--more--> unwelcome.
The US is nothing more than an out-of-control nation, hell-bent on making war wherever it can.
There’s simply no way America will get away with this.
No wonder they’re so paranoid!
A Gallup international poll of 68 countries found the US to be the greatest threat to world peace.
A history of American violence against innocent countries.
It is quite repulsive.
More evidence that the United States is not ‘recovering’.
The percentage of Americans owning small businesses is at an all-time low.
Household debt is increasing again.
A short explanation of the mortgage crimes from seven years ago.
Credit card debt is increasing again.
Floridians charged with a misdemeanor for ‘living together’ while unmarried!
(Yes, still illegal).
